con:request.name: 2. RetrivePNR
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Reservation.Request"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:RetrievePNR> <!--Optional:--> <tem:RetrievePnrRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID>${Run Security Token#Response#declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Security.Response'; declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; //ns1:RetrieveSecurityTokenResponse[1]/ns1:RetrieveSecurityTokenResult[1]/a:SecurityToken[1]}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad:CarrierCode> <rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>${#TestSuite#carriercode}</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Optional:--> <rad:ClientIPAddress xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <!--Optional:--> <rad:HistoricUserName xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad1:ActionType>GetReservation</rad1:ActionType> <rad1:ReservationInfo> <rad:SeriesNumber>${#TestSuite#SeriesNumber}</rad:SeriesNumber> <rad:ConfirmationNumber>${#TestCase#PNR}</rad:ConfirmationNumber> </rad1:ReservationInfo> </tem:RetrievePnrRequest> </tem:RetrievePNR> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ModifyPNR_RemoveServiceBundleFromReservation
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Reservation.Request"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:ModifyPNR> <!--Optional:--> <tem:ModifyPnrRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID>${Run Security Token#Response#declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Security.Response'; declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; //ns1:RetrieveSecurityTokenResponse[1]/ns1:RetrieveSecurityTokenResult[1]/a:SecurityToken[1]}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad:CarrierCode xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> </rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Optional:--> <rad:ClientIPAddress>?</rad:ClientIPAddress> <!--Optional:--> <rad:HistoricUserName>?</rad:HistoricUserName> <rad1:ActionType>RemoveSpecialServiceFromReservation</rad1:ActionType> <rad1:ReservationInfo> <rad:SeriesNumber>${#TestSuite#SeriesNumber}</rad:SeriesNumber> <rad:ConfirmationNumber>${#TestCase#PNR}</rad:ConfirmationNumber> </rad1:ReservationInfo> <rad1:FareInformationID>-214</rad1:FareInformationID> <rad1:LogicalFlightKeyToReplace>${empty}</rad1:LogicalFlightKeyToReplace> <rad1:LogicalFlightKeyToRemove>${empty}</rad1:LogicalFlightKeyToRemove> <rad1:PersonOrgIdentifierToRemove>-214</rad1:PersonOrgIdentifierToRemove> <rad1:PassengersToAdd> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> </rad1:PassengersToAdd> <rad1:PassengersToUpdate> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> </rad1:PassengersToUpdate> <rad1:SpecialServices> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> </rad1:SpecialServices> <rad1:SpecialServicesToCancel> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad1:SpecialServiceToCancel> <rad1:AirlineKey>299:${#TestCase#PNR}</rad1:AirlineKey> <rad1:LogicalFlightKey>${#TestCase#LogicalFlightKey}</rad1:LogicalFlightKey> <rad1:PhysicalFlightKey>${#TestCase#PhysicalFlightKey}</rad1:PhysicalFlightKey> <rad1:CustomerKey>${#TestCase#CustomerKey}</rad1:CustomerKey> <rad1:AirlinePersonKey>${#TestCase#AirlinePerKey}</rad1:AirlinePersonKey> <rad1:ChargeKey>345678</rad1:ChargeKey> <rad1:Comment>test</rad1:Comment> </rad1:SpecialServiceToCancel> </rad1:SpecialServicesToCancel> <rad1:ContactInformationToAdd> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> </rad1:ContactInformationToAdd> <rad1:ContactInformationToUpdate> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> </rad1:ContactInformationToUpdate> <rad1:CommentToAdd> <rad1:CommentID>-214</rad1:CommentID> <rad1:Comment>Modify by canceling special service Test</rad1:Comment> </rad1:CommentToAdd> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <rad1:IsFlightDisruptionModify>false</rad1:IsFlightDisruptionModify> <!--Optional:--> </tem:ModifyPnrRequest> </tem:ModifyPNR> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 4 ModifyPNR_RemoveSSR
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Reservation.Request"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:ModifyPNR> <!--Optional:--> <tem:ModifyPnrRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID>${Run Security Token#Response#declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Security.Response'; declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; //ns1:RetrieveSecurityTokenResponse[1]/ns1:RetrieveSecurityTokenResult[1]/a:SecurityToken[1]}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad:CarrierCode> <rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>1D</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Optional:--> <rad:ClientIPAddress>1.1.1.1</rad:ClientIPAddress> <!--Optional:--> <rad:HistoricUserName>radixx</rad:HistoricUserName> <rad1:ActionType>RemoveSpecialServiceFromReservation</rad1:ActionType> <rad1:ReservationInfo> <rad:SeriesNumber>${#TestSuite#SeriesNumber}</rad:SeriesNumber> <rad:ConfirmationNumber>${#TestCase#PNR}</rad:ConfirmationNumber> </rad1:ReservationInfo> <rad1:FareInformationID>-1</rad1:FareInformationID> <rad1:LogicalFlightKeyToReplace>?</rad1:LogicalFlightKeyToReplace> <rad1:LogicalFlightKeyToRemove>?</rad1:LogicalFlightKeyToRemove> <rad1:PersonOrgIdentifierToRemove>-214</rad1:PersonOrgIdentifierToRemove> <rad1:PassengersToAdd xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad1:PassengersToUpdate xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad1:SpecialServices xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad1:SpecialServicesToCancel> <rad1:SpecialServiceToCancel> <rad1:AirlineKey>299:${#TestCase#PNR}</rad1:AirlineKey> <rad1:LogicalFlightKey>${#TestCase#LogicalFlightKey}</rad1:LogicalFlightKey> <rad1:PhysicalFlightKey>${#TestCase#PhysicalFlightKey}</rad1:PhysicalFlightKey> <rad1:CustomerKey>${#TestCase#CustomerKey}</rad1:CustomerKey> <rad1:AirlinePersonKey>${#TestCase#AirlinePerKey}</rad1:AirlinePersonKey> <rad1:ChargeKey>546078</rad1:ChargeKey> <rad1:Comment>Remove SSR</rad1:Comment> </rad1:SpecialServiceToCancel> </rad1:SpecialServicesToCancel> <rad1:ContactInformationToAdd xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad1:ContactInformationToUpdate xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad1:CommentToAdd> <rad1:CommentID>0</rad1:CommentID> <rad1:Comment>Remove SSR</rad1:Comment> </rad1:CommentToAdd> <rad1:IsFlightDisruptionModify>false</rad1:IsFlightDisruptionModify> <!--Optional:--> <rad1:FlightDisruptionModify>true</rad1:FlightDisruptionModify> </tem:ModifyPnrRequest> </tem:ModifyPNR> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 7. Save PNR
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Reservation.Request"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:CreatePNR> <!--Optional:--> <tem:CreatePnrRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID>${#TestSuite#securityToken}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad:CarrierCode> <rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>${#TestSuite#carriercode}</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Optional:--> <rad:ClientIPAddress>1.1.1.1</rad:ClientIPAddress> <!--Optional:--> <rad:HistoricUserName>radixx</rad:HistoricUserName> <rad1:ActionType>SaveReservation</rad1:ActionType> <rad1:ReservationInfo> <rad:SeriesNumber>299</rad:SeriesNumber> <rad:ConfirmationNumber>${1. Run_Test1 Create OW booking without SSR and seat#PNR}</rad:ConfirmationNumber> </rad1:ReservationInfo> </tem:CreatePnrRequest> </tem:CreatePNR> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
